sentence.Network_en: Elliott crossed the finish line just half a second behind his adversary.

sentence.Network_en: She'd half expected him to withdraw from the course.

sentence.Network_en: The French, who led 21-3 at half time, scored eight tries.
sentence.Network_cn: 上半场以21：3领先的法国队有8个达阵得分。
